meta.Title: WITH CLUES FROM THE NEWS [New York Times, Sunday, October 17, 1943]
meta.Author: Harriot T. Cooke

across.question: Scene of brilliant action by USAFF in Rumania.

down.question: Ship's boats reserved for commanding officers.
